articles.content:
Birmingham City club captain Troy Deeney has claimed that the atmosphere in B9 'felt like the old St Andrews again' after coming from behind to draw 1-1 with erstwhile Championship leaders Burnley.

articles.title: Watford fans at South Bermondsey station before half time - Watford Observer
